version_description:
Crypto.com Wallet is the most secure and flexible crypto wallet. 
Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com Wallet.

In this update:
- Improved transaction UI to display ETH fee used for sending ERC-20 tokens
- Other minor bug fixes & improvements

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com Wallet. In this update:

- Optimize sending BTC, LTC, ETH, XRP and XLM
- Other minor bug fixes & improvements

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com Wallet. In this update:
- Minor bug fixes & improvements

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com Wallet. In this update:
- Minor bug fixes & improvements

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com Wallet. In this update:
- Fix ETH internal transactions display and other minor improvements

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com Wallet. In this update:
- Minor bug fixes & UI improvements

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com Wallet. In this update:
- Support other fiat display currencies, EUR, GBP, SGD and more

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com DeFi Wallet. In this update:
- Minor bug fixes & UI improvements

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com DeFi Wallet. In this update:
- Support WalletConnect: explore DeFi Swap and other DApps by scanning the QR code with DeFi Wallet

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com DeFi Wallet. In this update:
- Support Replace-by-Fee: speed up or cancel your pending ETH/ERC-20 send requests
- Minor bug fixes & UI improvements

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com DeFi Wallet. In this update:
- Minor bug fixes & UI improvements

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com DeFi Wallet. In this update:
- Multi-Wallet Support: Create or import more than one wallet for accessible multi-wallet management
- Ethereum Testnet: Perform test transactions on the Ethereum Testnets (Ropsten, Kovan, Rinkeby, and Goerli)

Safely store BTC, ETH and other digital assets with Crypto.com DeFi Wallet. In this update:
- Support DeFi Swap: Easily exchange ETH/ERC20 tokens directly on the DeFi Wallet app
- Minor bug fixes & UI improvements
